body.p:
Philadelphia, January 10th 1862
No. 243 South Fifth Street
Hon. Jas W. Tate
Asst Secretary of State
Frankfort Ky
Dear Sir,

Your favor of the 6th inst is just received, in which it is stated that my Commission as a Commissioner of Deeds for Kentucky will be renewed upon your receipt of Five Dollars the State Tax thereon. This amount is herewith remitted in a United States Treasury Note. I remain

Very Respy
Your obedt Servt
Arthur M. Burton

Pennsylvania
Comr. of Deeds
A. M. Burton
Philad
Comd. Jany 13. 1862
